channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 4e9b8407-af2e-495b-ae54-bb60a55b1b5a
Display name: Chamber Admin
Description: Lets you manage everything under your Modeling and Simulation Workbench chamber.
Link: https://management.azure.com/4e9b8407-af2e-495b-ae54-bb60a55b1b5a?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 4447db05-44ed-4da3-ae60-6cbece780e32
Display name: Chamber User
Description: Lets you view everything under your Modeling and Simulation Workbench chamber, but not make any changes.
Link: https://management.azure.com/4447db05-44ed-4da3-ae60-6cbece780e32?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 49fc33c1-886f-4b21-a00e-1d9993234734
Display name: AVS on Fleet VIS Role
Description: Do not remove this role from your resource because it is critical to enable your AVS private cloud to operate. If the role is removed, it will cause your AVS private cloud control plane to no longer operate correctly. The role is used to enable the AVS private cloud control plane to inject address prefix changes of the private clouds attached virtual network to SDN and support peering sync feature. This role is not intended for use cases outside of assignment to the associated AVS identity in your entra-id tenant.
Link: https://management.azure.com/49fc33c1-886f-4b21-a00e-1d9993234734?api-version=2022-04-01
